text:
Marc,

The existent code is consistent with the indetended logic. 

If the layout ignores the exception, the WriterAppender will output it one line 
at a time. If the layout does not ignore the exception, i.e. it handles it, 
then there is no need for WriterAppender to output it a second time.

There is no option for not output exceptions, except if the layout lies about 
the way it handles exceptions. I am marking this bug as RESOLVED INVALID. 
--
Ceki
